roleset.name: (cause to) become unfurled
roleset.note: UNFURL-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire. VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls bend-45.2. comparison with 'unfold.' (from unfurl.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: From the tallest tower, they unfurled a banner which read 'Property Act - Housing for local people.'
example.arg: a banner which read 'Property Act - Housing for local people

example.name: unaccusative, unfurling flowers
example.text: [The bright golden petals]-1 seemed to sense she was there and *-1 slowly unfurled to face her.
